text: Armand Gensonné (10 August 1758 in Bordeaux – 31 October 1793 in Paris) was a French politician. He was the 13th President of the National Convention from 7 to 21 March 1793. Category:1758 births Category:1793 deaths Category:Politicians from Bordeaux Category:Presidents of the National Convention
title: Armand Gensonné
